00093 
00094 void Op_Diff_CoviMAC_Elem::completer()
00095 {
00096   Op_Diff_CoviMAC_base::completer();
00097   const Equation_base& eq = equation();
00098   const Champ_P0_CoviMAC& ch = ref_cast(Champ_P0_CoviMAC, eq.inconnue().valeur());
00099   const Zone_CoviMAC& zone = la_zone_poly_.valeur();
00100   if (zone.zone().nb_joints() && zone.zone().joint(0).epaisseur() < 1)
00101     Cerr << "Op_Diff_CoviMAC_Elem : largeur de joint insuffisante (minimum 1)!" << finl, Process::exit();
00102   flux_bords_.resize(zone.premiere_face_int(), ch.valeurs().line_size());
00103 
00104   const RefObjU& modele_turbulence = eq.get_modele(TURBULENCE);
00105   if (modele_turbulence.non_nul())
00106     {
00107       const Modele_turbulence_scal_base& mod_turb = ref_cast(Modele_turbulence_scal_base,modele_turbulence.valeur());
00108       const Champ_Fonc& lambda_t = mod_turb.conductivite_turbulente();
00109       associer_diffusivite_turbulente(lambda_t);
00110     }
00111 }
00112 
00113 double Op_Diff_CoviMAC_Elem::calculer_dt_stab() const
00114 {
00115   const Zone_CoviMAC& zone = la_zone_poly_.valeur();
00116   const IntTab& e_f = zone.elem_faces();
00117   const DoubleTab& nf = zone.face_normales(),
00118                    *alp = sub_type(Pb_Multiphase, equation().probleme()) ? &ref_cast(Pb_Multiphase, equation().probleme()).eq_masse.inconnue().passe() : NULL,
00119                     &diffu = diffusivite_pour_pas_de_temps().valeurs(), &lambda = diffusivite().valeurs();
00120   const DoubleVect& pe = zone.porosite_elem(), &vf = zone.volumes_entrelaces(), &ve = zone.volumes();
00121   update_nu_invh();
00122 
00123   int i, e, f, n, N = equation().inconnue().valeurs().dimension(1), cD = diffu.dimension(0) == 1, cL = lambda.dimension(0) == 1;
00124   double dt = 1e10;
00125   DoubleTrav flux(N);
00126   for (e = 0; e < zone.nb_elem(); e++)
00127     {
00128       for (flux = 0, i = 0; i < e_f.dimension(1) && (f = e_f(e, i)) >= 0; i++) for (n = 0; n < N; n++)
00129           flux(n) += zone.nu_dot(&nu_, e, n, &nf(f, 0), &nf(f, 0)) / vf(f);
00130       for (n = 0; n < N; n++) if ((!alp || (*alp)(e, n) > 1e-3) && flux(n)) /* sous 0.5e-6, on suppose que l'evanescence fait le job */
00131           dt = min(dt, pe(e) * ve(e) * (alp ? (*alp)(e, n) : 1) * (lambda(!cL * e, n) / diffu(!cD * e, n)) / flux(n));
00132       if (dt < 0) abort();
00133     }
00134   return Process::mp_min(dt);
00135 }
00136 
00137 void Op_Diff_CoviMAC_Elem::dimensionner_blocs(matrices_t matrices, const tabs_t& semi_impl) const
00138 {
00139   update_phif(!nu_constant_); //calcul de (nf.nu.grad T) : si nu variable, stencil complet
00140   const std::string nom_inco = equation().inconnue().le_nom().getString();
00141   if (semi_impl.count(nom_inco)) return; //semi-implicite -> rien a dimensionner
00142   const Zone_CoviMAC& zone = la_zone_poly_.valeur();
00143   const IntTab& f_e = zone.face_voisins();
00144   int i, j, k, e, e_s, p_s, f, fb, m, n, n_sten = 0;
00145   std::vector<Matrice_Morse *> mat(op_ext.size());
00146   for (i = 0; i < (int) op_ext.size(); i++) //une matrice potentielle a remplir par operateur de op_ext
00147     mat[i] = matrices.count(i ? nom_inco + "_" + op_ext[i]->equation().probleme().le_nom().getString() : nom_inco) ?
00148              matrices.at(i ? nom_inco + "_" + op_ext[i]->equation().probleme().le_nom().getString() : nom_inco) : NULL;
00149 
00150   std::vector<int> N(op_ext.size()); //nombre de composantes par probleme de op_ext
00151   std::vector<IntTrav> stencil(op_ext.size()); //stencils par matrice
00152   for (i = 0; i < (int) op_ext.size(); i++)
00153     stencil[i].resize(0, 2), stencil[i].set_smart_resize(1), N[i] = op_ext[i]->equation().inconnue().valeurs().line_size();
00154 
00155   IntTrav tpfa(0, N[0]); //pour suivre quels flux sont a deux points
00156   zone.creer_tableau_faces(tpfa), tpfa = 1;
00157 
00158   Cerr << "Op_Diff_CoviMAC_Elem::dimensionner() : ";
00159   for (f = 0; f < zone.nb_faces(); f++) for (i = 0; i < 2; i++) if ((e = f_e(f, i)) >= 0 && e < zone.nb_elem()) //stencil a l'element e
00160         {
00161           if (phif_d(f, 0) == phif_d(f + 1, 0) && phif_d(f, 1) == phif_d(f + 1, 1))
00162             Process::exit(Nom("Op_Diff_CoviMAC_Elem: missing flux detected for face") + Nom(f) + " in " + zone.zone().domaine().le_nom() + " !");
00163           for (j = phif_d(f, 0); j < phif_d(f + 1, 0); j++) if ((e_s = phif_e(j)) < zone.nb_elem_tot()) //partie "simple" (phif_e / phif_c) : ne melange pas les composantes
00164               for (n = 0; n < N[0]; n++)
00165                 {
00166                   stencil[0].append_line(N[0] * e + n, N[0] * e_s + n);
00167                   if (e_s == f_e(f, 0) || e_s == f_e(f, 1)) continue;
00168                   for (k = 0; k < 2; k++) tpfa(f, n) &= phif_c(j, n, k) == 0;
00169                 }
00170           for (j = phif_d(f, 1); j < phif_d(f + 1, 1); j++) //partie "complexe" (phif_pe / phif_pc) : melange les composantes et les problemes
00171             if (mat[p_s = phif_pe(j, 0)] && (e_s = phif_pe(j, 1)) < op_ext[p_s]->equation().zone_dis()->nb_elem_tot()) for (n = 0; n < N[0]; n++)
00172                 {
00173                   for (m = 0; m < N[p_s]; m++) stencil[p_s].append_line(N[0] * e + n, N[p_s] * e_s + m);
00174                   if ((p_s == 0 && (e_s == f_e(f, 0) || e_s == f_e(f, 1))) || ((fb = zone.fbord(f)) >= 0 && p_s == pe_ext(fb, 0) && e_s == pe_ext(fb, 1))) continue;
00175                   for (m = 0; m < N[p_s]; m++) for (k = 0; k < 2; k++) tpfa(f, n) &= phif_pc(j, n, m, k) == 0;  //si pt hors du flux a deux points, on regarde si les coeffs sont nuls
00176                 }
00177         }
00178 
00179   for (i = 0; i < (int) op_ext.size(); i++) if (mat[i])
00180       {
00181         tableau_trier_retirer_doublons(stencil[i]);
00182         Matrice_Morse mat2;
00183         Matrix_tools::allocate_morse_matrix(N[0] * zone.nb_elem_tot(), N[i] * op_ext[i]->equation().zone_dis()->nb_elem_tot(), stencil[i], mat2);
00184         mat[i]->nb_colonnes() ? *mat[i] += mat2 : *mat[i] = mat2;
00185       }
00186 
00187   for (auto &&st : stencil) n_sten += st.dimension(0); //n_sten : nombre total de points du stencil de l'operateur
00188   Cerr << "width " << Process::mp_sum(n_sten) * 1. / (N[0] * zone.zone().md_vector_elements().valeur().nb_items_seq_tot())
00189        << " " << mp_somme_vect(tpfa) * 100. / (N[0] * zone.md_vector_faces().valeur().nb_items_seq_tot()) << "% TPFA " << finl;
00190 }
00191 
00192 void Op_Diff_CoviMAC_Elem::ajouter_blocs(matrices_t matrices, DoubleTab& secmem, const tabs_t& semi_impl) const
00193 {
00194   update_phif();
00195 
00196   const std::string& nom_inco = equation().inconnue().le_nom().getString();
00197   int i, j, k, e, e_s, f, f_s, m, n, M = phif_pc.dimension(2), n_ext = op_ext.size(), p;
00198   std::vector<Matrice_Morse *> mat(n_ext); //matrices
00199   std::vector<int> N(n_ext); //composantes
00200   std::vector<const Zone_CoviMAC *> zone(n_ext); //zones
00201   std::vector<const Conds_lim *> cls(n_ext); //conditions aux limites
00202   std::vector<const IntTab *> fcl(n_ext); //tableaux "fcl"
00203   std::vector<const DoubleTab *> inco(n_ext); //inconnues
00204   for (i = 0; i < n_ext; i++)
00205     {
00206       std::string nom_mat = i ? nom_inco + "_" + op_ext[i]->equation().probleme().le_nom().getString() : nom_inco;
00207       mat[i] = !semi_impl.count(nom_inco) && matrices.count(nom_mat) ? matrices.at(nom_mat) : NULL;
00208       zone[i] = &ref_cast(Zone_CoviMAC, op_ext[i]->equation().zone_dis().valeur());
00209       cls[i] = &op_ext[i]->equation().zone_Cl_dis().les_conditions_limites();
00210       const Champ_P0_CoviMAC& ch = ref_cast(Champ_P0_CoviMAC, op_ext[i]->equation().inconnue().valeur());
00211       inco[i] = semi_impl.count(nom_mat) ? &semi_impl.at(nom_mat) : &ch.valeurs();
00212       N[i] = inco[i]->line_size(), fcl[i] = &ch.fcl();
00213     }
00214   const IntTab& e_f = zone[0]->elem_faces(), &f_e = zone[0]->face_voisins();
00215   const DoubleVect& fs = zone[0]->face_surfaces();
00216 
00217   /* derivee de la contribution en l'element e : cder(ider[{p, e}], compo d'arrivee, compo de depart) */
00218   std::map<std::array<int, 2>, int> ider;
00219   DoubleTrav cder, fac, flux(N[0]);
00220   cder.set_smart_resize(1), fac.set_smart_resize(1);
00221   for (e = 0; e < zone[0]->nb_elem(); cder.resize(0, N[0], M), ider.clear(), e++)
00222     {
00223       for (i = 0; i < e_f.dimension(1) && (f = e_f(e, i)) >= 0; i++) /* remplissage des seconds membres et de ider / cder */
00224         {
00225           double prefac = fs(f) * (e == f_e(f, 0) ? 1 : -1);
00226           for (flux = 0, j = phif_d(f, 0); j < phif_d(f + 1, 0); j++) //indices/coeffs simples
00227             {
00228               e_s = phif_e(j), f_s = e_s - zone[0]->nb_elem_tot();
00229               for (fac.resize(N[0]), n = 0; n < N[0]; n++) fac(n) = prefac * (phif_w(f, n) * phif_c(j, n, 0) + (1 - phif_w(f, n)) * phif_c(j, n, 1));
00230               if (f_s < 0) //element
00231                 {
00232                   for (n = 0; n < N[0]; n++) flux(n) += fac(n) * (*inco[0])(e_s, n);
00233                   if (!mat[0]) continue;
00234                   if (!ider.count({{ 0, e_s }})) cder.resize((ider[ {{ 0, e_s }}] = cder.dimension(0)) + 1, N[0], M);
00235                   for (k = ider[ {{ 0, e_s }}], n = 0; n < N[0]; n++) cder(k, n, n) += fac(n);
00236                 }
00237               else if ((*fcl[0])(f_s, 0) == 1 || (*fcl[0])(f_s, 0) == 2) for (n = 0; n < N[0]; n++) //Echange_impose_base
00238                   flux(n) += fac(n) * ref_cast(Echange_impose_base, (*cls[0])[(*fcl[0])(f_s, 1)].valeur()).T_ext((*fcl[0])(f_s, 2), n);
00239               else if ((*fcl[0])(f_s, 0) == 4) for (n = 0; n < N[0]; n++) //Neumann non homogene
00240                   flux(n) += fac(n) * ref_cast(Neumann_paroi, (*cls[0])[(*fcl[0])(f_s, 1)].valeur()).flux_impose((*fcl[0])(f_s, 2), n);
00241               else if ((*fcl[0])(f_s, 0) == 6) for (n = 0; n < N[0]; n++) //Dirichlet
00242                   flux(n) += fac(n) * ref_cast(Dirichlet, (*cls[0])[(*fcl[0])(f_s, 1)].valeur()).val_imp((*fcl[0])(f_s, 2), n);
00243             }
00244           for (j = phif_d(f, 1); j < phif_d(f + 1, 1); j++) //indices/coeffs complexes
00245             {
00246               p = phif_pe(j, 0), e_s = phif_pe(j, 1), f_s = e_s - zone[p]->nb_elem_tot();
00247               for (fac.resize(N[0], N[p]), n = 0; n < N[0]; n++) for (m = 0; m < N[p]; m++)
00248                   fac(n, m) = prefac * (phif_w(f, n) * phif_pc(j, n, m, 0) + (1 - phif_w(f, n)) * phif_pc(j, n, m, 1));
00249               if (f_s < 0) //element
00250                 {
00251                   for (n = 0; n < N[0]; n++) for (m = 0; m < N[p]; m++) flux(n) += fac(n, m) * (*inco[p])(e_s, m);
00252                   if (!mat[p]) continue;
00253                   if (!ider.count({{ p, e_s }})) cder.resize((ider[ {{ p, e_s }}] = cder.dimension(0)) + 1, N[0], M);
00254                   for (k = ider[ {{ p, e_s }}], n = 0; n < N[0]; n++) for (m = 0; m < N[p]; m++) cder(k, n, m) += fac(n, m);
00255                 }
00256               else if ((*fcl[p])(f_s, 0) == 1 || (*fcl[p])(f_s, 0) == 2) for (n = 0; n < N[0]; n++) for (m = 0; m < N[p]; m++) //Echange_impose_base
00257                     flux(n) += fac(n, m) * ref_cast(Echange_impose_base, (*cls[p])[(*fcl[p])(f_s, 1)].valeur()).T_ext((*fcl[p])(f_s, 2), m);
00258               else if ((*fcl[p])(f_s, 0) == 4) for (n = 0; n < N[0]; n++) for (m = 0; m < N[p]; m++) //Neumann non homogene
00259                     flux(n) += fac(n, m) * ref_cast(Neumann_paroi, (*cls[p])[(*fcl[p])(f_s, 1)].valeur()).flux_impose((*fcl[p])(f_s, 2), m);
00260               else if ((*fcl[p])(f_s, 0) == 6) for (n = 0; n < N[0]; n++) for (m = 0; m < N[p]; m++) //Dirichlet
00261                     flux(n) += fac(n, m) * ref_cast(Dirichlet, (*cls[p])[(*fcl[p])(f_s, 1)].valeur()).val_imp((*fcl[p])(f_s, 2), m);
00262             }
00263           for (n = 0; n < N[0]; n++) secmem(e, n) += flux(n);
00264           if (f < zone[0]->premiere_face_int()) for (n = 0; n < N[0]; n++) flux_bords_(f, n) = flux(n);
00265         }
00266       /* remplissage des matrices a partir de ider / cder */
00267       for (n = 0; n < N[0]; n++) for (auto &&pe_k : ider) for (p = pe_k.first[0], e_s = pe_k.first[1], k = pe_k.second, m = 0; m < N[p]; m++) if (cder(k, n, m))
00268               (*mat[p])(N[0] * e + n, N[p] * e_s + m) -= cder(k, n, m);
00269     }
00270 }
